section.p:
The cost of passage on a boat heading downriver is 5 Shards. A barge here conveys passengers over to the west bank of the Rese at a cost of 1 Shard. Alternatively you can swim across by
making a SCOUTING roll at a Difficulty of 12 . (The current is strong, and the water icy cold.)
Your other option is to set out across the open countryside - there are no roads to speak of in this wild, unforgiving landscape.
